title: ICE: Didn't find associated type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
### STR

``` rust
#![feature(associated_types)]

trait Trait {
    type Type;
}

impl Trait for int {}  // Type not defined

fn main() {}
```
### Backtrace

``` rust
ai.rs:7:6: 7:11 error: internal compiler error: ImplCtxt::associated_type_binding(): didn't find associated type
ai.rs:7 impl Trait for int {}  // Type not defined
             ^~~~~
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
```
